Header: We overcame numerous obstacles to adopt the 19th amendment – Min. Harrison
Content: An event was held on Thursday to distribute packs of nutrients to pregnant mothers in the Anuradhapura – Central Nuwaragama Divisional Secretariat. The event which was  held at the Anuradhapura Youth rest house, was held under the auspices of Minister P. Harrison. Speaking a the event Minister of Social Services, Welfare and Livestock Development  P. Harrison said that when the 19th Amendment to the Constitution was brought, there were certain people who did not support it. Minister Harrison stated that even though numerous individuals now claim responsibility for the 19th amendment to the constitution, it was the current government that overcame numerous obstacles to adopt the amendment within a span of 3 months.
